text: The Democratic Republic of the Congo Basketball Federation (Febaco) is the governing body for men's and women's basketball in the Democratic Republic of the Congo. Febaco is an affiliate of FIBA Africa and its offices are located in Kinshasa. As of 2007 its president is Boni Mwawatadi. ==External links== *The DRCongo page at Africabasket Congo Category:Basketball in the Democratic Republic of the Congo Category:Sport in Kinshasa
title: Democratic Republic of Congo Basketball Federation
